title: GUESS THE CHAMP ;)

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Just guess who the champ was that bursted me! ;) doing this for fun, lets see if anyone guesses correctly...

(also doing it to make a point)

replies.body:
here is the solution:

http://imgur.com/x2oOFvD

it was Fulltank Tahm... well.... one offensive item... 
amazing how Tahm deals the same dmg as Orianna, Diana, Kata, Fizz, Annie, Kassa, etc...  
buy tons of resists and health ... have one offensive item only 
oneshot basically anyone... 
for me Tahm is the only "support" that can easily outtrade any adc or other champ (pretty much everyone) in 1 vs 1 ... 
hes the 2. most banned champ this month according to several websites... 
just funny how i as annie have to get Rabadons, RoA, Zhonyas, etc to deal the same amount of dmg a nearly fulltank deals to me! 

Sorry guys, no skin for you! (would have kept my word, but who the fuck expects Tahm to burst like shit?) ...  
point made?
maybe (if you like) spread this so riot sees how ridicolous a champ is that gets offensive value by defensive items (ult passive) 
hopefully that shit gets nerfed, and thx to all for your participation

to make this more interessting ill reveal the solutian at 8 pm tonight, the one who guesses correctly can add me for a skin ;)
one guess per person only though^^
not fizz ;) ill let ppl guess for a while, then i will reveal the original screenshot
